messages.subject: Please help me, I am an Indonesia...
messages.body:
S.O.S. S.O.S. S.O.S. S.O.S. S.O.S. S.O.S S.O.S S.O.S. S.O.S. S.O.S.

Dear  Sir,
Please help me.
I am an Indonesian and have just survived a devastating earth quake which
hit Asia very badly.

This was widely covered by CNN SKY News and BBC.( www.cnn.com/quake ).
I am now survived by only belongings left which I am wearing. All my
household properties have been washed away. I have lost many people whom I
love. There are about 703,518 people left homeless.

Several hundred thousand homes have been destroyed. More than 25,000
people died within minutes. I am sheltered by my friends at the moment.
The earth quake has been measured as 9.0 in the rector scale. The second
biggest to hit around the world in the century.

The sea was washed ashore about a km into the island. There was tidal
waves about 30 feet high. And all this happened in about 30 seconds. We
did not have any time to move. The damage to properties would run to
billions of dollars. The government has declared this as a National
disaster and five days of mourning.

I need all your help now to put myself together, and I also wish to help
as many other people here as I can who need help. The red cross and many
other organizations and countries are helping us but most of the aids they
are offering are not getting directly to the masses, and they are not yet
enough to go round.

Your kind consideration regarding this will be greatly appreciated, no
matter
how little it is.

Thank you and God bless you.

Yours,

Philip Mathew.

Dear Philip

I am shocked indeed to hear of your plight, and am very eager to help. After consultation with the board we are pleased to be able to make a gesture, ensuring you get what you truly deserve.

Would a consignment of our experimental foodstuffs be of a help? Our best product, Soylent Green is a nuitrious staple to any diet and can be combined with a range of local products to create a healthy and tasty meal, or taken on its own.

Regards,

messages.body:
Dear Philip

My apologies in replying to you but I have been away at the Ryvita Conference in Smegaroon.

I am delighted that you feel able to take advantage of my offer. We can arrange a charitable shipment of Soylent to you within a week or so with our compliments for you and all of your tribe. This will be entirely gratis of course and should be enough to serve approx 4,500 meals.

We offer Soylent Green, Red and Yellow, each of which offers different nutrient advantages. There's a body of research behind our products, bringing you all the advantage of engineered foodstuffs with none of the ethical considerations of regular farming, as I am sure you will agree. Incidentally, our Sales Director Harlon Cheston is available for a conference call on further supplies should you wish.

Please let us know your address for delivery. Would a container load suffice initially?

BILL

William R Simonson
CEO
Soylent Green Corporation

Many thanks for the delivery address and I have spoken to our Special Consignment Office manager Mr Miracsky who will be arranging the shipment.

Is the address you have given one suitable for taking delivery of the large metal container unit we customarily use for overseas Soylent cargo transfer? It weighs 60 tons and typically will measure 50 x 13 feet. It is not the sort of item that can be just left on the doorstep or put into a garage. Please advise, as time is getting on.

BILL

William R Simonson
CEO

messages.body:
Dear Philip

Thank you for this information, but I am concerned that you have not got back to me on storage for the Soylent cargo, given the size of the container likely to be despatched. We would not want our quality food substitute left out for the birds, or for brigands and looters to rifle through. We make our charitable contributions in good faith, but are worried that will not be utilised as we anticipated due to local conditions. We have our reputation to think of.

What can you say to reassure us?

Also, please note we have decided to make up the bulk of our shipment from our most popular product Soylent Green. It has more body than the other varieties we manufacture (Soylent Red, Yellow and Orange).

BILL

William R Simonson
CEO
Soylent Green Corporation
